name: BoredomBuster
0:
”Alexa, open Boredom Buster.”
”Alexa, tell Boredom Buster I'm bored.”
”Alexa, ask Boredom Buster to give me an activity.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: boredom buster
des: This skill will help bored kids find something to do by randomly choosing one of over 50 fun activities. The perfect tiebreaker for when no one can agree on the next activity.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
